answers.answer: have you had testing for diabetes?

You can still have a UTI or vaginal infection without the burning sensation or discharge. Also excess urination is one of many symptoms of diabetes. So I really think you should make an apt with your dr as soon as you can. It might be nothing. But if it's not, none of those are things to wait on.

question: im pee a lot more than i usually do have no pain but when finished have a funny sensation when finished
title: i have no paine when going to the loo for a wee just wee a lot more
